1.title: FARM TRACTORS - KIDS SHOW
1.plot: This is a video about fun farm tractors. Your child is gonna be able to watch real tractors working on a real farm. John Deere tractors on the farm making hay and stacking hay.

2.title: Learn to Count MONSTER TRUCKS! Numbers 1-10
2.plot: Monster trucks for children. Learning to count numbers from 1 to 10 has never been so fun. Counting Monster Trucks gravedigger. Blippi gives kids and children free fun educational videos. Learn Numbers, Shapes, Letters, Sounds, Colors, and more.

3.title: Tractors for CHILDREN
3.plot: This is a video of tractors working on the farm. Children, kids, toddlers love to watch farm tractors on the farm and this time they are gonna be able to watch real Tractors working on a real Farm.

4.title: Days of the week song - Nursery Rhyme
4.plot: Days of the week children's sign along educational video is meant to help learn the days of the week. Toddlers in Preschool and kindergarten can learn a lot of English with Blippi and in this video The Days of the Week in English.

5.title: ABC Song - Learn the Alphabet English
5.plot: This is a beautiful song for Learning the English Alphabet with this ABC Song. All the letters of the alphabet are sung in this fun Upbeat children's educational video series with Blippi.

6.title: Guitar Lessons for Kids
6.plot: In this great video, Nicky Notes (A Blippi friend) will give you some guitar lessons. With a lot of hard work and patience, learning guitar will become a fun activity for your child.

7.title: Airplanes for Kids - Learn Colors with Blippi
7.plot: In this video, Blippi will show you some different planes and its colors. You Will see real airplanes flying and getting into the airport. An excellent video child to entertained while learning colors with Blippi.

8.title: Monster Trucks for Kids - Learn Numbers and Colors
8.plot: Learn numbers and colors with Monster Trucks. Blippi will show you real Monster trucks in action while teaching your children fun life lessons like numbers, colors, shapes, words with Blippi.

9.title: Learn Colors, Teach Colors, Color Songs for KIDS - Color Yellow
9.plot: Learning colors has never been so fun. In This video, Blippi will show the color yellow to the kids in different things and teach them how to spell it. This video is perfect for teaching colors to children, kids, and toddlers.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: In this video, Blippi shows how to make Airplane art for Children and Kids who enjoy Arts. Blippi Shows children how to make airplanes from construction paper.

imdb.plot outline: Blippi is an American character on YouTube. Blippi videos are aimed at young children, and are educational. Blippi is a likable character and children love him. His special forté is his silly dancing. He has videos about everything from farms, tractors and bin lorries, to museums and theme parks. He introduces all sorts of concepts to children in a really fun, happy way. He even has a music album with his songs from his videos, such as 'Im an excavator'.
imdb.title: Blippi
plot: _Blippi_ (qv) is an energetic character that jumps off the screen with his goofy mannerisms but friendly demeanor. Children from the ages of 2 to 7 years old have quickly taken a liking to _Blippi_ (qv)'s fun personality and innovative teaching lessons.::Stevin J.

_Blippi_ (qv) is an American character on YouTube. _Blippi_ (qv) videos are aimed at young children, and are educational. _Blippi_ (qv) is a likable character and children love him. His special forté is his silly dancing. He has videos about everything from farms, tractors and bin lorries, to museums and theme parks. He introduces all sorts of concepts to children in a really fun, happy way. He even has a music album with his songs from his videos, such as 'Im an excavator'.::gaz1-3
